quotes.name: William Faulkner
quotes.quote: 'Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.'

quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn
quotes.quote: 'Nothing is impossible. The word itself says I'm possible.'

quotes.name: John F. Kennedy
quotes.quote: 'The greater our knowledge increases the more our ignorance unfolds.'

quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw
quotes.quote: 'Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.'
